title: Patti's Mussels a la Mariniere
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper, to taste
method: Step 1: Place mussels in a large bowl with enough cold water to cover; soak to remove any dirt or sand, about 20 minutes.

Step 2: Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-low heat. Add garlic; cook 1 minute, but do not brown. Add tomatoes and green onions; cook until almost tender. Stir in wine, parsley, and butter; bring to a boil. Boil until liquid has reduced by half, about 15 minutes; season with salt and black pepper.
Step 3: Add mussels to the pot, cover, and cook until shells are opened, about 10 minutes. Transfer mussels and sauce to a large serving bowl, discarding any unopened shells.
